requests.name: John Doe
requests.subject: Query about Product X
requests.message: I'd like to know more about Product X's features. Are there any additional benefits if I purchase the premium version? Also, is there any discount available for bulk purchases?

requests.name: Jane Smith
requests.subject: Issue with my order
requests.message: I haven't received my order #12345 yet. I ordered it last week and was expecting it to arrive within 3 days as per your delivery policy. Can you please check the status and let me know when I can expect it?

requests.name: Alice Johnson
requests.subject: Feedback on Product Y
requests.message: I recently purchased Product Y and I must say I'm extremely satisfied with its performance. I love the user-friendly interface and the detailed documentation that came with it. Just wanted to share my positive feedback. Keep up the good work!

requests.name: Bob Martin
requests.subject: Inquiry about Product Z
requests.message: I've been hearing a lot about Product Z lately. Can you provide more details about its specifications and pricing? Also, are there any ongoing promotions or discounts for new customers?

requests.name: Charlie Brown
requests.subject: Refund request for Order #67890
requests.message: I'd like to request a refund for my recent order #67890. The product arrived damaged and isn't functioning as expected. I've attached photos of the damaged item. Please let me know the next steps.

requests.name: Diana Ross
requests.subject: Technical Support for Product A
requests.message: I've been facing some technical issues with Product A. Every time I try to start it, I get an error message. I've tried reinstalling it multiple times but the issue persists. Can you please assist?

requests.name: Edward Norton
requests.subject: Billing Inquiry
requests.message: I noticed an extra charge on my last invoice. I wasn't expecting any additional fees. Can you provide a breakdown of the charges?

requests.name: Fiona Apple
requests.subject: Product B Availability
requests.message: I've been trying to purchase Product B from your website, but it seems to be out of stock. Do you have any information on when it will be available again?

requests.name: George Clooney
requests.subject: Feedback on Service
requests.message: I just wanted to commend your customer service team. I had an issue with my order and they were prompt, courteous, and resolved the issue quickly. Thank you!

requests.name: Halle Berry
requests.subject: Inquiry about Membership
requests.message: I'm interested in the premium membership plan you offer. Can you provide more details about the benefits and pricing?
